name: Lemon Cookie Whipped Shea Butter
description:
Lemon cookie combines the stress-relieving properties of lemon with the calming properties of vanilla. It is a light, playful scent that is sure to please just about anyone. 4oz
** This Whipped Shea Butter has a light sparkle to it.

Got dry skin? Well you’ve come to the right place. Even the driest of skin is no match for the luxurious, decadent, and moisturizing benefits of our Whipped Shea Body Butter. Due to its effective healing properties, rich fatty acid content, and antioxidants, shea butter has been an African treasure for centuries. We only use the finest unrefined shea butter as a base and combine it with cold-pressed grapeseed, apricot, and jojoba oils to create a product that is sure to rid you of your dry skin.

Directions: To use on skin, scoop up a small amount, rub hands together to melt it, and spread on skin after washing hands or bathing. Use on ends of hair to lock in moisture or to lay down flyaways. 

Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Unrefined Shea Butter) Fruit, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, essential oil blend, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide

description:

name: Lavender Gift Set
description:
This new gift set includes a 2oz tin of whipped Shea butter as well as a 4oz tub of emulsified dead sea salt body scrub. These detoxifying body scrubs gently exfoliate to create smoother skin. They can be used on dry skin to scrub away impurities or in the bathtub for a relaxing soak. Each set is made to order for absolute freshness and quality. 

Lavender: Lavender is one of the most popular essential oils. Its flowery scent has been shown to reduce stress, tension, insomnia, and headaches. The salt scrub contains real lavender flowers for a pop of color and added exfoliation.

Ingredients: Dead Sea Salt, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower, Polysorbate 80, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol  

*Only available for the holiday season!

name: Pumpkin Chai Gift Set
description:
This new gift set includes a 2oz tin of whipped Shea butter as well as a 4oz tub of emulsified dead sea salt body scrub. These detoxifying body scrubs gently exfoliate to create smoother skin. They can be used on dry skin to scrub away impurities or in the bathtub for a relaxing soak. Each set is made to order for absolute freshness and quality.

Pumpkin Chai: A rich sent with notes of vanilla, cardamom, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Smells just like a warm cup of pumpkin chai tea. The salt scrub contains cranberry seeds for a pop of color and added exfoliation.

Ingredients: Dead Sea Salt, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Cranberry Seeds, Polysorbate 80, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol (and) Caprylyl Glycol  

*Only available for the holiday season!
